Convermax Rockford Turn Theme Settings

Global theme settings#

General#

  1. Product
    1. Image border (checkbox) - adds img-thumbnail class to product-image
    2. Enable quick view (checkbox) - quick view toggle
    3. Stock indicator (checkbox) - shows ‚ÄúIn stock‚Äù progress bar on product page
    4. Low stock indicator (input) - If stock is below, stock indicator will be yellow instead of green (not working yet)
  2. Wishlist
    1. Enable wishlist (select) - wishlist toggle
    2. Wishlist icon (select) - changes wishlist icon (heart or star)
  3. Cart
    1. Cart icon (select) - changes cart icon (cart or bag)
    2. Cart dropdown image border (checkbox)

Colors#

  1. Base
    1. Primary (color picker) - #007bff by default
    2. Secondary (color picker) - #6c757d by default
    3. Dark (color picker) - #343a40 by default
    4. Light (color picker) - #f8f9fa by default
    5. Body (color picker) - #ffffff by default
  2. Utilities
    1. Product price (color picker) - #28a745 by default
    2. Badge / Sold out (color picker) - #d32f2f by default
    3. Badge / Discount (color picker) - #388e3c by default

Typography#

  1. Fonts:
    1. Headings font family (dialog) - Poppins Regular by default
    2. Body font family (dialog) - Poppins Regular by default

Social media#

  1. Social sharing image
    1. Image (dialog) - Shown when sharing a link on social media (not working yet)
  2. Social sharing buttons
    1. Share on Facebook (checkbox) - toggle
    2. Tweet on Twitter (checkbox) - toggle
    3. Pin on Pinterest (checkbox) - toggle
    4. Share on WhatsApp (checkbox) - toggle
    5. Send via Email (checkbox) - toggle
  3. Social media links
    1. Facebook link (text) - sharing link
    2. Twitter link (text) - sharing link
    3. Instagram link (text) - sharing link
    4. Pinterest link (text) - sharing link
    5. Snapchat link (text) - sharing link
    6. YouTube link (text) - sharing link
    7. LinkedIn link (text) - sharing link

Favicon#

  1. Favicon image (dialog) - Will be scaled down to 32x32

Toast#

Toast is used to display various important global messages usually via ajax. (E.g: When adding products to cart)

  1. Position (select) - Bottom left, bottom center, bottom right
  2. Autohide (range) - 10 - 60 sec, 15 sec by default

Checkout#

  1. Banner
    1. Background image (dialog) - sets header image
  2. Logo
    1. Custom image (dialog) - sets logo instead of ‚ÄúConvermax2‚Äù title
    2. Position (select) - left, center, right
    3. Logo size (select) - small, medium, large
  3. Main content area
    1. Background image (dialog) - sets background to main section
    2. Background color (color picker) - sets background color instead of image
    3. Form fields (select) - sets form color (white, transparent)
  4. Order summary
    1. Background image (dialog) - sets background to order summage section
    2. Background color (color picker) - sets background color instead of image
  5. Typography
    1. Headings (select) - Sans-Serif, Serif (System by default)
    2. Body (select) - Sans-Serif, Serif (System by default)
  6. Colors
    1. Accent (color picker) - Links, highlights and checkmarks
    2. Buttons (color picker) - Gift card/discount and next step buttons
    3. Errors (color picker) - Messages and invalid fields
  7. Checkout settings
    1. To customize more checkout settings, visit the admin. (link)

Header settings#

Announcement bar#

  1. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
  2. Background gradient (textarea) - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
  3. Message (richtext) - sets left top info message (‚ÄúFree Shipping & Easy Returns‚Äù by default)
  4. Message icon (html) - Copy and paste any SVG code from the recommended Bootstrap icons library. You may use svg codes from other sources as well. To change the icon size, edit the 'width' and 'height' values inside the SVG code.
  5. Contact (richtext) - sets contact information (title, phone number) (‚ÄúCall Us Free! +1-202-555-0159‚Äù by default)
  6. Contact icon (html) - Copy and paste any SVG code from the recommended Bootstrap icons library. You may use svg codes from other sources as well. To change the icon size, edit the 'width' and 'height' values inside the SVG code.

Header#

  1. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
  2. Background gradient (html) - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)

Logo#

  1. Logo settings (image picker) - change, edit or remove logo
  2. Logo height (px) (text) - sets logo size - Recommended is 40

Navbar#

  1. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
  2. Background gradient (html) - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
  3. Wrap in container (checkbox)

Menu#

  1. Menu settings (link list) - select a menu from the list or remove it
  2. Edit menu (link) - link to menu settings in admin panel

Infobar settings#

Add Content / Edit Content#

  1. Icon (html) - Copy and paste any SVG code from the recommended Bootstrap icons library. You may use svg codes from other sources as well. To change the icon size, edit the 'width' and 'height' values inside the SVG code.
  2. Icon color (color picker) - sets color to icon
  3. Title (text) - sets title
  4. Description (richtext) - sets description text

General settings#

  1. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary
  2. Wrap in container (checkbox)
  3. Heading size (select) - H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6

Rows#

  1. Items per row / Mobile (range)
  2. Items per row / Table (range)
  3. Items per row / Desktop (range)

Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)#

  1. Padding top (range)
  2. Padding bottom (range)
  3. Margin top (range)
  4. Margin bottom (range)

Add Content / Edit Content#

  1. Richtext
    1. Title (text)
    2. Description (richtext)
  2. Menu
    1. Title (text)
    2. Menu settings (link list) - select a menu from the list or remove it

  3. Newsletter - adds input and ‚ÄúSubscribe‚Äù button
    1. Title (text)
    2. Description (richtext)

Newsletter#

  1. Enable newsletter (checkbox) - newsletter toggle
  2. Title (text)
  3. Subtitle (richtext)
  4. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, secondary lighten, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
  5. Background gradient (html) - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
  6. Note (richtext) - footer text

General settings#

  1. Background color (select) - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
  2. Background gradient (html) - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
  3. Wrap in container (checkbox)
  4. Show payment icons (checkbox) - payment icons toggle
  5. Show ‚Äòpowered by‚Äô link (checkbox)
  6. Show ‚Äòpowered by‚Äô link (checkbox)
  7. Heading size (select) - H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6 - Content titles size

About us#

  1. Show About us (checkbox) - toggle
  2. Logo settings (image picker) - change, edit or remove logo
  3. Logo height (px) (text) - sets logo size - Recommended is 40
  4. Subtitle (richtext)
  5. Email (text) - Write your email as in the example info[at]domain[dot]com to protect it from spam bots. Leave empty to disable
  6. Phone (text) - Leave empty to disable
  7. Show Social icons (checkbox) - toggle social icons at the bottom

Footer menu#

  1. Footer menu settings (link list) - select a footer menu from the list or remove it
  2. Edit menu (link) - link to menu settings in admin panel

Rows#

  1. Items per row / Mobile (range)
  2. Items per row / Table (range)
  3. Items per row / Desktop (range)

Password Page settings#

  1. Logo settings (image picker) - change, edit or remove logo
  2. Logo height (px) (text) - sets logo size
  3. Show countdown (checkbox)
  4. Countdown date (text) - E.g.: Dec 31, 2020 00:00:00
  5. Show social icons (checkbox)
  6. Show ‚Äòpowered by‚Äô link (checkbox)
  7. Show theme by‚Äô link (checkbox)
